api_list.name: Get Sailors
api_list.description: Get list of all **Lost Ark** sailors details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lost-ark-simple.p.rapidapi.com/npcs/sailors"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lost-ark-simple.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Character Skills
api_list.description: List of Lost Ark Character Skills
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lost-ark-simple.p.rapidapi.com/skills/{character_name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lost-ark-simple.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
